<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="o">!</span> sudo mkdir -p -m <span class="m">0700</span> root/.ssh
<span class="o">!</span> cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub  <span class="p">|</span> sudo tee root/.ssh/authorized_keys
<span class="o">!</span> sudo chmod <span class="m">0600</span>  root/.ssh/authorized_keys
</pre></div>

    </div>
